about.title: About Me
about.p1: With over a decade of experience in software development, I've evolved from building traditional applications to pioneering blockchain solutions. My journey spans across various technologies and industries, always driven by innovation and excellence.
about.p2: For the past 4 years, I've been deeply immersed in the blockchain ecosystem, developing smart contracts, DeFi protocols, and decentralized applications that push the boundaries of what's possible in the Web3 space.
